original_title: 未満式アイドル撮影会『激シャ無理』 霧島さくら
overview: The long-awaited new series first! ! The target is 'Sakura-chan', a rookie model with soft and beautiful big breasts. At the photo session, the amateur camera boys get on top of it and play mischief! Lick it, even suck it, and let it be your pet!
title: Not Enough Idol Photography Special “Unbearably Intense” ( Sakura Kirishima )
